messages.subject: a little japanese book of early Showa date
messages.msgSnippet: Click here: eBay item 3713267641 (Ends Mar-29-04 16:18:59 PST) - JAPANESE BOOK OFSAMURAI SWORDS 1884
messages.messageBody:
Click here: eBay item 3713267641 (Ends Mar-29-04 16:18:59 PST) -
JAPANESE BOOK OFSAMURAI SWORDS 1884

http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=3713267641

this is a very good little reference book.........
I recall someone asked about those little " hats " people worn in the
bygone days, all headgears are labelled in kanji !!
Most native flora, fauna are also illustrated and
named................ now that should be a big help in identifying
the plants in tsuba/menuki etc...............

Milt
